caption: Commending the Honorable Gibson D. (Gib) Lewis on his long and distinguished tenure as speaker of the Texas House of Representatives and extending sincere appreciation to him for his many years of outstanding service on behalf of the legislature and the citizens of Texas.
In memory of Thomas Brazelton Steely.
Honoring the Rice Temple Baptist Church.

Relating to the liability of reimbursing employers for certain unemployment compensation benefit claims.

In memory of Trooper Mark Jeffrey Phebus.
Relating to motor vehicle insurance coverage and liability for motor vehicle accidents.

Relating to the regulation of the insurance industry, the punishment for certain criminal offenses relating to the business of insurance, maintaining motor vehicle financial responsibility, and creating certain offenses.

Relating to the regulation and taxation of bingo and bingo receipts; providing administrative and enforcement procedures and civil and criminal penalties.

Relating to a non-binding referendum on the establishment of English as the official language in which the business and affairs of the government are conducted in Texas.
Requesting the Division of Emergency Management to evaluate emergency evacuation policies involving Interstate 45 from Galveston to Conroe.
Requesting Congress to grant funds for the launch of Space Station Freedom before 1996.
Congratulating the League City Clear Lake High School boys' basketball team.
Congratulating The University of Texas Lady Longhorns volleyball team.

Relating to the reform of the workers' compensation system; to the creation, powers, and duties of the Texas Workers' Compensation Commission; to work safety; authorizing an appropriation; providing criminal and....

Relating to the punishment imposed for persons convicted of certain repeat felony offenses under the Texas Controlled Substances Act, and the availability of release on parole and mandatory supervision for those....

Relating to the admissibility of certain statements made by the accused in criminal proceedings.
Relating to the admissibility of evidence in criminal cases.
Relating to the making of payments to a crime stoppers program as a condition of probation.

Relating to the reenactment of the law relating to jury instructions on good conduct time and parole.
